sentences.en: [ Little ] Where's the cocksure sky jock I had last week?
sentences.cn: 上星期那个可靠的飞行员到哪里去了?

sentences.en: Don't be so cocksure that he will succeed.
sentences.cn: 不要那么确信他会成功.

sentences.en: Don't be too cocksure and take things for granted.
sentences.cn: 不要太过自信,以为就是这样的.自以为是.

sentences.en: He is too bloody cocksure about everything.
sentences.cn: 他对于每一件事都过于自信.

sentences.en: He seemed rather too cocksure for my liking.
sentences.cn: 他似乎太自以为是了，我不喜欢。

sentences.en: He's so cocksure I'd love to see him proved wrong.
sentences.cn: 他过分自信--我 倒 想看看他栽跟头.

sentences.en: If you are so marvellous and cocksure of yourselves, how come you waver?
sentences.cn: 你那么厉害,尾巴翘得那么高, 为什么动摇 呀 ?

sentences.en: Young people are unstable. They are cocksure.
sentences.cn: 年轻人不稳. 他们过于自信.

words.tran_cn: 自大的；骄傲的；过于自信的
确信的；独断的；过分自信的
